text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump No,at current rate, 1655 days to Coronavirus test half the people? 

Hong Kong under Lam        1,017 Cases               4 deaths
America under Trump    644,000 Cases    28,500 deaths

Hong Kong borders China. Lam February 8th began compulsory 14day anyone entering from China. https://t.co/DCWK7aBqJc

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
